channel.title: Help! port fowarding! - Wireless BroadBand Router
channel.description:
How i fowarding port ?
I cant find theres no "Add gaming" or servers what ?
Advanced:
Features Access Control Define Internet access rights for PCs on your LAN. Dynamic DNS Use with "Virtual Servers" to allow Internet users to connect to your Servers using a URL instead of an IP address. Internet Special Applications, DMZ, URL Filter Virtual Servers Allow Internet users to access Servers on your LAN. WAN Port An alternative to using the Wizard for Internet Access configuration. Configuration Config File Backup or restore the configuration file for the Wireless Router. Logs Set system log options, E-mailing of logs, view all logs. Network Diag Ping, DNS Lookup. Options Backup DNS, TFTP firmware upgrade, UPnP. PC Database View and modify the list of PCs. QoS Quality of Service settings. Remote Management Allow management of this device via the Internet. Routing Only required if your LAN has other Routers or Gateways. Security Firewall and other security-related settings. Upgrade Firmware The firmware can be upgraded using your Web Browser.

item.title: Help! port fowarding! - Wireless BroadBand Router
item.dc:creator: @Bladerr Bladerr
item.description:
@Bladerr wrote:

How i fowarding port ?

I cant find theres no “Add gaming” or servers what ?

Advanced:

Features
Access Control Define Internet access rights for PCs on your LAN.
Dynamic DNS Use with “Virtual Servers” to allow Internet users to connect to your Servers
using a URL instead of an IP address.
Internet Special Applications, DMZ, URL Filter
Virtual Servers Allow Internet users to access Servers on your LAN.
WAN Port An alternative to using the Wizard for Internet Access configuration.
Configuration
Config File Backup or restore the configuration file for the Wireless Router.
Logs Set system log options, E-mailing of logs, view all logs.
Network Diag Ping, DNS Lookup.
Options Backup DNS, TFTP firmware upgrade, UPnP.
PC Database View and modify the list of PCs.
QoS Quality of Service settings.
Remote Management Allow management of this device via the Internet.
Routing Only required if your LAN has other Routers or Gateways.
Security Firewall and other security-related settings.
Upgrade Firmware The firmware can be upgraded using your Web Browser.
